title: Seat Removed
description: Fired when a seat or license is deprovisioned from a user in a B2B account.

seatId.description: Unique identifier for the seat or license.

userId.description: Unique identifier for the user whose seat was removed.

reason.description: The reason the seat was removed.

totalSeats.description: Total number of seats available on the account.

usedSeats.description: Number of seats currently in use on the account.

plan.description: The plan associated with the account.
